hero.headline: Telecommunications Engineer
hero.aboutMe: Telecommunications Engineer (URJC, 2026) with experience delivering real software solutions end-to-endâ€”from analysis and implementation to documentation and delivery. Creator of Code-XR (open source) for VS Code, linked to VISSOFT @ ICSME 2025. Graduated and, within the current academic year, eligible for extracurricular internships (up to 550 hours) or full-time employment. Motivated to keep growing and explore different professional domains.

codeXr.title: Code-XR
codeXr.subtitle: VS Code extension for XR visualization of software metrics

obt.title: OBT
obt.subtitle: Internal VBGroup tool delivered end-to-end: backend in Express/TypeScript with cloud integrations; frontend in React + Tailwind. Focused on security, automation, and delivery.

about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a Telematics Engineering student (URJC) and the author of Code-XR, an ecosystem that connects static analysis with immersive visualization of metrics.
about.p2: Our work has been accepted for VISSOFT 2025 (co-located with ICSME 2025). I am preparing the thesis and consolidating documentation and tooling for its evolution.
about.p3: I care about clean code, modular architecture, and a strong DX/UX. I aim for systems that scale and can be maintained.

journey.title: Professional Journey
journey.subtitle: Experience, education, and key milestones
journey.hoverHint: Select an item to view details
journey.clickYearHint: Click on a year to see monthly details

urjc.desc: Comprehensive training in software engineering, networks, and systems. Progressive specialization in full-stack development and XR technologies. Final thesis linked to VISSOFT 2025.

adyra.desc: Automation of internal processes through scripts and digital tools. Optimization of time and reduction of manual errors in day-to-day operations.

vbgroup.desc: End-to-end development of internal tool for management/operations. Backend with Express.js and TypeScript, integrating Azure Cosmos DB and Blob Storage. Frontend with React + Tailwind. Teamwork under Agile/Scrum.

codexr.desc: VS Code extension for XR/3D/AR visualization of software metrics. End-to-end architecture: static analysis, XR scene mapping, documentation. +300 downloads on Marketplace.

vissoft.desc: Research paper on XR visualization of software metrics accepted for presentation at international conference.
